tool_name: Product Lookup by UPC or EAN
tool_description: Look up product info — like name, image, and description — using any barcode number (UPC, EAN, or ISBN)
title: Product Lookup by UPC or EAN

api_list.name: Look Up Product by Barcode (UPC, EAN)
api_list.description: Retrieves product data based on the given UPC/EAN/GTIN.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://product-lookup-by-upc-or-ean.p.rapidapi.com/code/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "product-lookup-by-upc-or-ean.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
